solution_line_template: The total amount of money that Jason invested is x=${current_worth}/{total_investment_multiplier}
The total amount of money that Jason has earned from his investments is ${current_worth}-${initial_investment}=${<<{current_worth}-{initial_investment}={total_earnings}>>}{total_earnings}

If he earned an equal amount of money from the investment in five months, his monthly returns is {total_earnings}/{months_invested}=${<<{total_earnings}/{months_invested}={monthly_returns}>>}{monthly_returns}
